description: This schema validates the JSON serialization of any reconciliation query batch, i.e. the payload of a POST to a reconciliation endpoint.

oneOf.description: A property value which represents another entity, for instance if it was previously reconciled itself

queries.description: A list of queries to be processed by the service

type.description: A type identifier indicating which class of entities to restrict the search to

limit.description: The maximum number of candidates to return

lang.description: The text-processing language for the query

conditions.description: A list of conditions to select candidates

matchType.description: A string to indicate whether to match the supplied value to entity names or property values

pid.description: The identifier of the property, whose values will be compared to the values supplied. Required if 'matchType' is 'property'.

v.description: A value (or array of values) to match against the entity names or property values associated with the property on each candidate

required.description: A boolean indicating if a match of this condition is required for an entity to enter the list of candidates

matchQuantifier.description: A string to indicate which of the values in v to match

matchQualifier.description: A string to indicate how to match the values in v
